title: Senior Software Engineer PHP and Go (System Architecture)
description:
This position will work directly with the Chief Technology Officer (Swedish, Engineer) and Product manager (Canadian) to build high performance, scalable systems. You will be migrating a legacy product (PHP) to a new architecture (Go). The work will require working with, and breaking apart a monolithic architecture to develop multiple micro-services in new architecture. 

• Design and build high performance, scalable and testable components for the platform  
• Work with CTO to plan, design and build new system   
• Create clean, efficient, well-documented code  
• Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues  
• Participate in code reviews  
• Design and write cutting-edge backend services for Edu2Review
requirements:
• Programming experience (5-7+ years) 
• Work experience in PHP (2+ years), Go (1+ years) 
• Experience in system architecture, working with AWS services
• A passion for quality and best practices but understands the balance between perfection and delivering value quickly 
• Strong understanding of back-end workflows  
• Taking ownership and responsibility of components and modules 
• Familiarity with entire web stack, web protocols, and performance optimization  
• Advanced level of spoken of English  
• Excellent communication skills, sharp analytical abilities with proven design skills, ability to think critically system growth and stability 
• Collaborate with product and experience teams to define and prototype features
